app.name: SDcafiine
app.long_description:
Put your files into "SD:/sdcafiine/TITLEID/MODPACK/content" or "SD:/sdcafiine/TITLEID//MODPACKaoc" where TITLEID is your 16 byte long TileID.
CREDITS : Cafiine creation - chadderz (and MrBean35000vr ?) Inital SDCafiine creation - golden45 (see https://gbatemp.net/goto/post?id=5680630) HBL support and further improvements - Maschell minor improvements - Zarklord Icon and Meta by pwsincd
